item.title: Beyond Efficiency: Molecular Data Pruning for Enhanced Generalization
item.description: MolPeg, a novel molecular data pruning framework, enhances model generalization in transfer learning by using a source-free approach and consistently outperforming other methods, even surpassing full-…

item.title: Generalizablity of Memorization Neural Network
item.description: Unlocking deep learning’s generalization mystery, this research pioneers a theoretical understanding of memorization neural network generalizability, revealing critical network structural requirements…

item.title: Hallo3D: Multi-Modal Hallucination Detection and Mitigation for Consistent 3D Content Generation
item.description: Hallo3D: a tuning-free method resolving 3D generation hallucinations via multi-modal inconsistency detection and mitigation for consistent 3D content.

item.title: Improving Robustness of 3D Point Cloud Recognition from a Fourier Perspective
item.description: Boosting 3D point cloud recognition robustness, Frequency Adversarial Training (FAT) leverages frequency-domain adversarial examples to improve model resilience against corruptions, achieving state-of…

item.title: Understanding and Improving Adversarial Collaborative Filtering for Robust Recommendation
item.description: PamaCF, a novel personalized adversarial collaborative filtering technique, significantly improves recommendation robustness and accuracy against poisoning attacks by dynamically adjusting perturbatio…

item.title: Visual Anchors Are Strong Information Aggregators For Multimodal Large Language Model
item.description: AcFormer, a novel vision-language connector for MLLMs, leverages ‘visual anchors’ to reduce computation cost by ~66% while improving accuracy.
